caption:
This photograph is an aerial view of a densely forested landscape, with a noticeable contrast between areas covered in trees and cleared land. The cleared areas form meandering patterns that suggest they could be paths, smaller water courses, or areas affected by logging. A large river cuts prominently through the scene from top to bottom, flanked by trees on either side exhibiting a noticeably lighter green color, possibly indicating changes in vegetation or soil moisture compared to more forested areas. 

The river's surface reflects light, giving it a silvery appearance and it winds through the terrain, forming several curves and bends which suggest its natural flow over the landscape. The different textures and patterns indicate a variety of vegetation densities and possibly different types of land use or natural formations. 

The overall image captures a rugged natural environment with significant water presence and human influence, hinting at both the resilience of nature and its vulnerability to changes imposed by human activities.
title: Clear cutting
